articles.title: Tesla stock rises after strong delivery numbers in Q3
articles.content: Tesla shares increased more than 7% after announcing record-breaking delivery figures for Q3 2024. Analysts cite strong demand in Europe and Asia.

articles.title: Analysts warn Tesla margins may shrink due to price cuts
articles.content: While Tesla continues to grow in global sales, experts note that repeated price reductions could impact profit margins in future quarters.

articles.title: Tesla expands to India, boosting investor optimism
articles.content: Tesla confirmed plans to open its first gigafactory in India next year. The news generated excitement among investors anticipating new market opportunities.

articles.title: Elon Musk teases new self-driving AI update
articles.content: Tesla CEO Elon Musk tweeted about a major FSD software update coming soon, promising improved reliability and wider rollout by early 2025.
